chat.defaultMessage1: Good day! I am your virtual assistant for searching manuals. You can ask me any question about our technical documents, manuals or specifications. For example, try to ask about the procedure for replacing a component or about the technical parameters of a particular device. I am here to give you quick and accurate answers.
chat.defaultMessage2: We found 3 similar products, please select one to start a chat with. If you did not find the product you are looking for, please enter the serial number or product name in the chat introduction.
chat.heroMessage2: We build beautiful products with the latest technologies and frameworks. We are a team of passionate developers and designers that love to build amazing products.
